unit_specific.description: This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: Every model is equipped with: a plague probe.
wargear_options: This model's plague probe can be replaced with 1 fleshmower.
If a model is not equipped with a fleshmower, it can be equipped with one of the following: 1 heavy blight launcher or 2 plaguespitters.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
